<!-- source-hash: 482687d9eaf09e3e02f947a76a167b0f -->
Response DTO for paginated organization list endpoints in the external REST API, providing organization data with pagination metadata.

## Key Components

**Main Fields:**
- `organizations` - List of organization data objects
- `total` - Total count of available organizations
- `hasNextPage`/`hasPreviousPage` - Pagination navigation flags
- `startCursor`/`endCursor` - Cursor-based pagination pointers

**Annotations:**
- `@Data` - Generates getters, setters, toString, equals, and hashCode
- `@Builder` - Enables fluent builder pattern for object construction
- `@NoArgsConstructor`/`@AllArgsConstructor` - Default and full constructors

## Usage Example

```java
// Building a paginated response
OrganizationsResponse response = OrganizationsResponse.builder()
    .organizations(organizationList)
    .total(150)
    .hasNextPage(true)
    .hasPreviousPage(false)
    .startCursor("cursor_start_123")
    .endCursor("cursor_end_456")
    .build();

// Accessing pagination info
if (response.getHasNextPage()) {
    String nextCursor = response.getEndCursor();
    // Fetch next page using cursor
}
```

This DTO supports both count-based totals and cursor-based pagination, making it suitable for efficient handling of large organization datasets in external API responses.
